いざ鎌倉: (いざかまくら) - case that something major happens; event of an emergency; when it comes to the crunch
いしかり型護衛艦: (いしかりがたごえいかん) - Ishikari class destroyer escort
いじくり回す: (いじくりまわす) - to fiddle with; to monkey around with
いじける: (いじける) - to grow timid (e.g. from an inferiority complex)/to lose one's nerve; to become perverse/to become contrary
いじめ自殺: (いじめじさつ) - suicide caused by bullying or harassment; bullying-related suicide
いじらしい: (いじらしい) - innocent; lovable; sweet; pitiful; pathetic
いじり回す: (いじりまわす) - to tinker with; to fumble with; to twist up
いずれ菖蒲か杜若: (いずれあやめかかきつばた) - equally beautiful
いたこ: (イタコ) - necromancer (esp. a blind female in northeastern Honshu); medium; shaman
いたずらっ子: (いたずらっこ) - mischievous child/scamp/rascal; elf/imp
いたずら坊主: (いたずらぼうず) - (yoji) mischievous boy; troublemaker; pesky kids
いたずら書き: (いたずらがき) - scribbling; doodling; graffiti
いたずら者: (いたずらもの) - mischief-maker/trickster/prankster; lascivious person (esp. a loose woman); useless fellow; mouse/rat
いたずら電話: (いたずらでんわ) - crank call; prank phone call
いたせんぱら: (いたせんぱら) - deepbody bitterling (species of cyprinid, Acheilognathus longipinnis)
いたちの道: (いたちのみち) - not to write to or visit someone; road of the weasel (it is believed that if someone blocks the path a weasel, he will never take that path again)
いたちの道切り: (いたちのみちきり) - not to write to or visit someone; road of the weasel (it is believed that if someone blocks the path a weasel, he will never take that path again)
いたみ悲しむ: (いたみかなしむ) - to mourn; to grieve
いた椎: (イタジイ) - Castanopsis sieboldii (species of chinquapin)
いちい樫: (イチイガシ) - Quercus gilva (species of oak)
いちこめ: (いちこめ) - (from 100メートル個人メドレー) 100 metre individual medley (swimming)
いちびり: (いちびり) - prankster; joker; taking a joke to the extreme
いちびる: (いちびる) - to mess around; to get carried away; to press one's luck
いちゃいちゃ: (いちゃいちゃ) - flirt; make out
いちゃつく: (いちゃつく) - to flirt with; to dally
いちゃもんを付ける: (いちゃもんをつける) - to pick a fight; to find fault
いち押し: (いちおし) - recommendation/(something) highly recommended; to recommend
いち推し: (いちおし) - recommendation/(something) highly recommended; to recommend
いち早く: (いちはやく) - promptly/quickly/without delay; before others/first
いっかくじゅう座: (いっかくじゅうざ) - Monoceros (constellation); the Unicorn
いっけ: (いっけ) - prefix used to strengthen a derogatory adjective
いっせいの: (セイノー) - all together now!; one, two, go!; ready, set, go!; heave, ho!; oops-a-daisy
いっせーの: (セイノー) - all together now!; one, two, go!; ready, set, go!; heave, ho!; oops-a-daisy
いっそ: (いっそ) - (formerly written as 一層) rather; sooner; preferably
いっその事: (いっそのこと) - rather; sooner; preferably
いったい何なんですか: (いったいなんなんですか) - what is it exactly?; what is it precisely
いったい全体: (いったいぜんたい) - (yoji) (emph. form of 一体) ... the heck (e.g. "what the heck?"); ... in the world (e.g. "why in the world?"); ... on earth (e.g. "who on earth?")
いってら: (いってらあ) - have a good day; take care; see you
いってらあ: (いってらあ) - have a good day; take care; see you
いってらー: (いってらあ) - have a good day; take care; see you
いって参ります: (いってまいります) - good bye; I'm off; see you later
いって来ます: (いってきます) - (often has a response of いってらっしゃい)  I'm off; see you later
いって来る: (いってくる) - I'm off/see you later; to go (and then come back)
いっらしゃいませ: (いっらしゃいませ) - welcome (in shops, etc.)
いつかそのうち: (いつかそのうち) - one of these days; before very long; in the near future
いつになったら: (いつになったら) - when; how soon
いつの日にか: (いつのひにか) - one of these days; someday
いつの時代にも: (いつのじだいにも) - in all ages; over the ages; forever and ever
いつの時代も: (いつのじだいも) - in all ages; over the ages; forever and ever
いつの間にか: (itsunomanika) - antes que se perceba, antes que se dê conta, despercebido, sem perceber
いつの間にやら: (いつのまにやら) - unawares; unnoticed; before you know it
いつまで経っても: (いつまでたっても) - no matter how much time passes
いつもいつも: (いつもいつも) - year in, year out; 24-7
いつもの通りに: (いつものとおりに) - as always
いつも通り: (いつもとおり) - as always; as usual
いつ何どき: (いつなんどき) - at any time; every moment
いつ何時: (いつなんどき) - at any time; every moment
いつ頃: (いつごろ) - about when; how soon
いとこ半: (いとこはん) - first cousin once removed
いとこ婚: (いとここん) - cousin marriage; marriage between cousins
いとこ煮: (いとこに) - vegetables boiled in miso
いとこ違い: (いとこちがい) - parent's cousin; first-cousin once removed
いとし子: (いとしご) - beloved child; dear child
いとど: (いとど) - old name for a cave cricket; even though/despite/even more/still
いとはん: (いとはん) - daughter (of a good family)
いとも簡単に: (いともかんたんに) - very easily
いないいないばあ: (いないいないばあ) - peekaboo (baby game); peepbo
いなか者: (いなかもの) - countryman; provincial; person from the country; provincial person; bumpkin; hick; hillbilly
いなくなる: (いなくなる) - (from いる and なる)  to disappear; to stop being; to leave
いぬ年: (いぬどし) - year of the dog
いのちの電話: (いのちのでんわ) - telephone counselling service
いのちを捨てる: (いのちをすてる) - to give one's life; to lay down one's life
いの一番: (いのいちばん) - first of all; first thing
